document_data.caption: A map showing Nelkaush the Weaver on Coach Street.
document_data.name: Nelkaush the Weaver
document_data.mainbody: '''Nelkaush the Weaver''' was a textiles shop located in [[Waterdeep]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The building stood one story tall.
document_data.Location: Nelkaush the Weaver was located in the southeastern section of the [[Waterdeep/Southern Ward|Southern Ward]] on the north side of [[Coach Street]] west of [[Carter's Way]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Volo 5295}}
document_data.Inhabitants: The shop was owned by its namesake, [[Nelkaush]], in the {{YearlinkName|1372}}.
